resources.string: Virus Wars according to the rules for regular gameplay.
Regular gameplay with obstacle viruses added, for players who like a challenge!

The goal of the game is to prevent the other player from moving. The starting player, Colony O, will make 1 move to begin to balance out the starting advantage, and then each player will make 3 moves per turn. When moving a player can: 

 	■ Place a virus in any of the adjacent cells surrounding an existing live virus 
 	■ Kill an opponent's virus, creating a chain of killed viruses the player can move through 

 In Sudden Death Mode, each player is only given 1 move per turn. In Challenge Mode, green viruses represent obstacles that neither player can move through, so a player must find the best way around them. In all modes, the goal remains the same, stop your opponent. Tap the back arrow to undo a move or the restart arrow to start a new game. 

 There are options in the toolbar for returning to the selection screen changing the game's grid size, saving or loading a game, and muting the sound.
